title: Reed Smith Hires 11-Lawyer Real Estate Finance Group From Akerman | The American Lawyer - The American Lawyer
content: Reed Smith Hires 11-Lawyer Real Estate Finance Group From Akerman | The American Lawyer  The American Lawyer
description: Randy Eckers, who previously led the real estate finance group at Akerman, said Reed Smith's ability to securitize the commercial real estate loans that his group originated would help him to grow the practice.
